message_1: Suppose you intercept a Caesar cipher message that was encrypted by shifting each letter of the plaintext 3 letters to the right in the alphabet. The encrypted message reads: "khoor zruog". What is the original plaintext message?
message_2:
To decrypt the Caesar cipher message, we need to shift each letter of the ciphertext 3 letters to the left in the alphabet.

k -> h
h -> e
o -> l
o -> l
r -> o

z -> w
r -> o
u -> r
o -> l
g -> d

The original plaintext message is "hello world".
